p: Differential scanning calorimetry (DSC) examination of loratadine, sulpiride and their physical mixture (1:1) were performed using a DSC-131 Evo (Setaram Inc., France). 2–5 mg samples were weighed in crucible pans covered with pierced caps. The temperature was raised gradually from 25 to 500 °C at a heating rate of 10 °C/min under a nitrogen flow rate of 40 ml/min.
